qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital and Tremont General Hospital, what are the ages of patients K. Ramos and L. Bailey?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital, patient K. Ramos is 82 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Tremont General Hospital, patient L. Bailey is 27 years old.

content: Severe bone pain and difficulty in walking for 3 days.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital and Tremont General Hospital, what are the preliminary diagnoses for patients K. Ramos and L. Bailey?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital, the preliminary diagnosis for patient K. qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital and Tremont General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, K. Ramos or L. Bailey?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: K. Ramos was admitted on October 26, and L. Bailey was admitted on September 24. L. Bailey was admitted earlier.
